content.body: I believe import.now is still at Stage i, as in imaginary
But it would be coherent with XS compartment.importNow, which does at least have an explainer

MetaMask and Agoric are implementing a Compartment importNowHook presently, which would be hooked by import.now if the specified module hasnâ€™t previously loaded (importHook returns a Promise so is ineligible in that case)
